mapper.select: SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, ROUND(AVG_RATING,1) as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as imgFile, AREA as area, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RES_ID = #{resId}

SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, ROUND(AVG_RATING,1) as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as imgFile, AREA as area, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM RESTAURANT WHERE OWNER_ID = #{ownerId}

SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, ROUND(AVG_RATING,1) as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as imgFile, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk, REV_COUNT, AREA as area FROM RESTAURANT ORDER BY resId DESC

SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, ROUND(AVG_RATING,1) as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as imgFile, AREA as area, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM RESTAURANT WHERE lower(RES_NAME) like '%${keywords}%'

SELECT RES_ID as resId, RES_NAME as resName, RES_ADDRESS as resAddress, RES_PHONE as resPhone, OWNER_ID as ownerId, RES_DES as resDescription, ROUND(AVG_RATING,1) as avgRating, RES_CATEGORY as categoryId, RES_IMG as imgFile, AREA as area, IS_TOGETHER_OK as isTogetherOk FROM (SELECT * FROM RESTAURANT WHERE AREA LIKE '%${category1}%' AND RES_CATEGORY LIKE '%${category2}%') ORDER BY ${sortType} DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESTAURANT (RES_ID, RES_NAME, RES_ADDRESS, RES_PHONE, OWNER_ID, RES_DES, AVG_RATING, RES_CATEGORY, RES_IMG, IS_TOGETHER_OK, AREA) VALUES ('r' || RESID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{resName}, #{resAddress}, #{resPhone}, #{ownerId}, #{resDescription}, #{avgRating}, #{categoryId}, #{imgFile}, #{isTogetherOk}, #{area})
